doc.title: Bhool
doc.plot: About a woman trying to put her tragic past behind her. Uzma has suffered devastating losses in her young life. In her therapy and escape, she immerses herself in growing a successful company. But in her need to protect herself from the realities of her fate, can Uzma ever trust again, can she ever love again? It is in this that lays her ultimate test. Bhool is a sensitive portrayal of a woman's struggle to survive life's unexpected curve balls and the resilience of the human spirit.
